overview: An experimental docu-fiction short about two best friends and their  group of friends who are documenting their wanderings late into the night. Focusing on Aman a 21 year old amateur filmmaker and his best friend Tarique a CA aspirant. How both of them see each other as friends and their lives, a reminiscence of a daily life woven into a couple of nights.A conflict between fiction and non-fiction filmmaking, often switching between the two.
title: A rough cut
